meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tim Wood Steven Meyer Jim Vercolen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2500.

td.p: Tim Wood, a graduate student from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Steven Meyer, an attorney from Middletown, Connecticut
Jim Vercolen, a part-time teacher from Rochester, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $33,500)

tr.td: CONNECTICUT
MOVIES
MUSEUMS
HISTORY
BREAKFAST CEREALS
COWBOY TALK
